Description: HIGHER EDUCATION INSTITUTIONS WILL ASSIST WITH PUBLIC AWARENESS EFFORTS ABOUT AMERICORPS VISTA SERVICE OPPORTUNITIES WITHIN CAMPUS COMMUNITIES AND, WHERE APPROPRIATE, SURROUNDING CITIES AND COMMUNITIES, TO INCREASE THE NUMBER OF APPLICANTS APPLYING TO AMERICORPS VISTA OPPORTUNITIES.
